mapper.update: UPDATE stock_info SET STOCK_NAME = #{stockName}, OPEN_PRICE = #{openPrice}, CLOSE_PRICE = #{closePrice}, LOW_PRICE = #{lowPrice}, HIGH_PRICE = #{highPrice} WHERE STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_info (STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, OPEN_PRICE, CLOSE_PRICE, LOW_PRICE, HIGH_PRICE) VALUES (#{stockCode}, #{stockName}, #{openPrice}, #{closePrice}, #{lowPrice}, #{highPrice})

insert into virture_stock (VIRTUAL_DEAL_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, STOCK_CODE, VIRTUAL_DEAL_PRICE, VIRTUAL_DEAL_VOLUME, VIRTUAL_DEAL_TIME) values (#{virtualDealNum}, #{memberNum}, #{stockCode}, #{virtualDealPrice}, #{virtualDealVolume}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count_stock from cumulative_stock where member_num = #{memberNum} and stock_code = #{stockCode}
select virtual_deal_price, virtual_deal_volume from virture_stock where member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: insert into cumulative_stock (member_num, stock_code, count_stock) values (#{memberNum}, #{stockCode}, #{countStock})
mapper.update: update cumulative_stock set count_stock = #{count} where member_num = #{memberNum} and stock_code = #{stockCode}
mapper.select: SELECT s.STOCK_CODE AS STOCK_CODE, s.STOCK_NAME AS STOCK_NAME, cs.COUNT_STOCK AS COUNT_STOCK FROM stock_info s JOIN cumulative_stock cs ON s.STOCK_CODE = cs.STOCK_CODE WHERE cs.member_num = #{memberNum}
